surname San
three/3
surname Min
the people/nationality/citizen
Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People (late 1890s)
Sanmin district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan
Sanmin district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan

sentences.english: Just show me one county where Dr. Sun's principles have been put in practice.
sentences.chinese: 你给我指出哪一个县实施了孙中山先生的三民主义？

sentences.english: The manifesto marks off the two epochs in the history of the Three People's Principles.
sentences.chinese: 这篇宣言，区分了三民主义的两个历史时代。

sentences.english: What are the Three Principles of The People?
Is it realistic of Chiang Ching kuo to propose unifying China with the "Three People's Principles"?
sentences.chinese: 蒋经国提出用“三民主义”统一中国，这现实吗？

sentences.english: The Kuomintang could not have gone forward unless it had developed them into the new Three People's Principles.
sentences.chinese: 如不把它发展到新三民主义，国民党就不能前进。

sentences.english: They are, by the simplest definition, the principles for our nation's salvation.
sentences.chinese: 用最简单的定义说，三民主义就是救国主义。

sentences.english: The noumenon of the "Three Principles of the People " was an important topic that the monthly magazine New Life discussed.
sentences.chinese: 三民主义本体是《新生命》月刊检讨的重要议题。

sentences.english: Debate of Sanmin Doctrine was a unique political-cultural phenomenon in the period of Anti-Japanese War.
sentences.chinese: 三民主义论战是抗战时期的独特政治文化现象。
